name: Gloom Stalker
description: Gloom Stalkers thrive in darkness, ambushing foes before they can react.

3.name: Gloom Stalker Magic
3.description: You always have certain spells prepared.

3.name: Dread Ambusher
3.description: You gain initiative bonuses and extra damage on the first round of combat.

3.name: Umbral Sight
3.description: You gain darkvision and become invisible to creatures relying on darkvision.

7.name: Iron Mind
7.description: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.

11.name: Stalkerâ€™s Flurry
11.description: You can make an extra attack when you miss.

15.name: Shadowy Dodge
15.description: You impose disadvantage on an attack roll made against you.
